data.comment: James Linington starts the match. Bristol City with the kick-off in London.
QPR's Rob Dickie scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 27, Rob Dickie (QPR) gets a yellow card.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Nahki Wells.
James Linington blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, QPR have kicked-off the second half at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Dean Holden (Bristol City) is making a first substitution, with Tommy Rowe replacing Jay DaSilva.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Adam Nagy.
In the minute 57, Nahki Wells (Bristol City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Albert Adomah is replacing Dominic Ball for QPR at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
Mark Warburton is making the team's second substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Macauley Bonne replacing Lyndon Dykes.
In the minute 69, Tom Carroll is booked for the home team.
The home team have replaced Lee Wallace with Niko Hamalainen. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a fourth substitution, with Charlie Kelman replacing Chris Willock.
In the minute 83, Tyreeq Bakinson is replacing Antoine Semenyo for the away team.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 1-2.
Dean Holden is making the team's third substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Taylor Moore replacing Nahki Wells.
Famara Diedhiou is replacing Chris Martin for Bristol City at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
